revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) [29]:;Petheus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetsooukis, drachmas 8;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tahorion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Agathopous, slave of Taseus alias Isarion, obols 28;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Maron, son of Maron, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Herois, drachmas 8;;Diodoros, fatherless, mother Thaisas, obols 28;;Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Ammonis, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Ptollis, grandson of Herakles, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Horos, son, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 96, obols 27;;(Phamenoth) 17 likewise:;12th year Heras, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 16 copper drachmas 16;;Melanas, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis, drachmas 8;;Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Abykis, son of Demas, grandson of Abykis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, drachmas 4;;Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Euhemeros, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 4, obols 27;;in total for the day drachmas 76, obols 27;;(Phamenoth) 18 likewise:;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Apynchis, grandson of Sambas, mother Thatres, drachmas 12;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinos, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4 obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 28, obols 27;;(Phamenoth) 19 likewise:;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Longinos Archonian previously known as Herais, son of Theogidon (Neilos);orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 6, 2 1/2 obols, oil-production drachmas 1, naubion obols5;;added charges drachma 1, obols 3 1/2 and 2 khalkoi, eparourion drachmas 4, 2 obols, added charges obols 2 khalkoi 2, kollybos1 1/2 obol, in total drachmas 16, 5 obols;;geometria for year 12 drachmas 16, 2 khalkoi, added charges drachma 1, 2 khalkoi, in total drachmas 17, 1/2 obol;;Taorsenouphis, daughter of Papeis through Soeros;;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2, 3 obols, tax on olive produce 2 obols 2 chalki, naubion 1 1/2 obol, added charges 3 1/2 obols 2 chalki;;eparourion drachma 1, 4 obols added charges 1 obol kollybos 1/2 obol 2 chalki, in total drachmas 5, 4 obols 2 chalki;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6, 1 1/2 obol added charges 2 1/2 obols, in total drachmas 6, 4 obols;;[naubion of katoikoi for 13th year 4 obols added charges 1/2 obol, kollybos 2 chalki]."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
